message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, but I'm open to discussion.
You started high, I'll meet you in the middle
Let's be reasonable and split it evenly. We both get a fair share, and we don't risk losing everything with more rounds.
You're trying to be reasonable, but I'm not willing to give up so much yet
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better share than that. Let's split it 60/40 in your favor, and we can both walk away with something.
You're trying to get a better deal, but I'm not going to give up so easily
We're running out of time, and inflation is hurting both of us. Let's make a deal before it's too late. I propose a 70/30 split in your favor.
You're getting desperate, I'm not going to let you take advantage of me
We're getting dangerously close to the deadline. I'm willing to accept an 80/20 split in your favor, but this is my final offer.
You're really running out of options, I'm not going to let you get away with this
We're down to the wire. I'm willing to accept a 90/10 split in your favor. It's not much, but it's better than both of us getting nothing.
You're out of options, I'm taking it all
